newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Computervision cut to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Computervision cut to buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Sheila Ennis cut her rating on Computervision Corp shares to buy from strong buy after the company, on Friday pre-announced a fourth quarter earnings shortfall.

-- In a statement, Ennis said she cut the rating because Computervision's "visibility on individual quarters appears to be decreasing", due to the number of large size orders, an inability to predict order closings and little order backlog.
-- However, she noted the company continues to win strategically important contracts and nearly met its goal of growing software product revenues by 20 pct in 1996.
